statements: SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_tracking;
SELECT process_name, energy_saved FROM energy_efficiency_tracking ORDER BY energy_saved DESC;
SELECT process_id, process_name, cost_savings FROM energy_efficiency_tracking WHERE energy_saved > 500;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_tracking ORDER BY cost_savings ASC;
SELECT process_name, cost_savings FROM energy_efficiency_tracking WHERE cost_savings > 1000 ORDER BY cost_savings DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_tracking WHERE cost_savings > 5000 ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT process_name, energy_saved FROM energy_efficiency_tracking WHERE energy_saved BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_tracking WHERE process_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT process_name, energy_saved, cost_savings FROM energy_efficiency_tracking WHERE energy_saved > 3000 AND cost_savings < 8000 ORDER BY cost_savings DESC;
SELECT process_name, cost_savings FROM energy_efficiency_tracking WHERE cost_savings = (SELECT MAX(cost_savings) FROM energy_efficiency_tracking);
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_improvements;
SELECT process_name, cost_savings FROM energy_efficiency_improvements WHERE cost_savings > 1000;
SELECT * FROM industrial_processes ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT process_name, energy_consumption FROM industrial_processes WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_improvements WHERE improvement_type = 'Insulation' ORDER BY cost_savings ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_improvements;
SELECT id, process_name, cost_savings FROM energy_efficiency_improvements WHERE cost_savings > 1000;
SELECT process_name, improvement_type, cost_savings FROM energy_efficiency_improvements ORDER BY cost_savings DESC;
SELECT AVG(cost_savings) AS average_cost_savings FROM energy_efficiency_improvements;
SELECT process_name, energy_consumption, efficiency_rating FROM industrial_processes WHERE efficiency_rating > 80 ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT process_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC
SELECT process_name, improvement_type, cost_savings FROM EnergyEfficiencyImprovements WHERE cost_savings > 5000
SELECT process_name, cost_saved FROM CostAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM EnergyEfficiencyImprovements;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT process_name, improvement_type, cost_savings FROM EnergyEfficiencyImprovements WHERE cost_savings > 5000;
SELECT e.process_id, e.energy_consumed, c.cost_saved FROM EnergyConsumption e INNER JOIN CostAnalysis c ON e.process_id = c.process_id;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, cost_saved FROM CostAnalysis ORDER BY cost_saved DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_sources;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY consumption_date ASC;
SELECT source_name, cost_savings FROM energy_sources JOIN cost_savings ON energy_sources.id = cost_savings.source_id WHERE cost_savings.cost_savings > 5000;
SELECT * FROM process_improvements WHERE improvement_description LIKE '%efficiency%';
SELECT * FROM energy_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT ec.energy_consumed, cs.cost_savings FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN cost_savings cs ON ec.source_id = cs.source_id WHERE ec.consumption_date > '2022-01-01' AND cs.saving_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT es.source_name, pi.improvement_description FROM energy_sources es LEFT JOIN process_improvements pi ON es.id = pi.source_id WHERE LENGTH(pi.improvement_description) > 50;

SELECT es.source_name, SUM(ec.energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_sources es LEFT JOIN energy_consumption ec ON es.id = ec.source_id GROUP BY es.source_name ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT ec.*, es.source_name FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN energy_sources es ON ec.source_id = es.id WHERE ec.energy_consumed > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT plant_id, month, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM Plants ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT AVG(cost_saved) AS average_cost_saved, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM ProcessImprovements;
SELECT plant_id, month, savings, source FROM EnergySavings WHERE month BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT plant_id, month, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY month DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM Plants WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT plant_name, month, savings FROM EnergySavings WHERE month >= '2022-01-01' AND month <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY savings DESC;
SELECT plant_name, process_name, description FROM Plants INNER JOIN Processes ON Plants.plant_id = Processes.process_id WHERE Plants.plant_id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, month, cost_saved FROM Plants INNER JOIN ProcessImprovements ON Plants.plant_id = ProcessImprovements.plant_id WHERE cost_saved > 5000 ORDER BY month ASC LIMIT 5;
